snippet.title: Ion Maiden - Official Console Reveal Trailer [Xbox One, PS4 and Switch]
snippet.description:
Ion Maiden is coming to consoles!

Build engine is back and with it Ion Maiden! Get ready for classic first-person shooter full of guns, blood, gore and explosions! All wrapped in a retro coat with implemented good stuff from the last two decades like headshots, more physics and interactivity, widescreen, controller support, autosaves and much more! 

Release date: Q2 2019
Platforms: PC, PS4, Xbox One, Nintendo Switch

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/562860/Ion_Maiden/
Website: http://www.1cpublishing.eu/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/1CCompany/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/1C_Company
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/1ccompany/
